channel.title: GlobalScape - World of Entire [Released Beta For you to Work On]
channel.description:
[center] GlobalScape
The World Of Entire Begins http://www.mediafire.com/?4kei5xj53sdafp9
First here goes the credits-
Bakatool - Guardian-15% jennipher11-Source Base - 15% Shardyboy (me) - Re - Creation Cleaned - 70%
Thanks Guys - Anyway heres the ServerGlobalScape is a huge Multi-player online adventure game created by shardyboy, My base is project Guardian an old classic base ive used and cleaned out and coded from scratch.Its really stable i used my own syi and currently holded 300+ players! So im going to create a great economy also make the prices correct not like other servers where whip is like 50m, on this its obviously roughly around 3m-3.2m just an example showing its similiar to Runescape.Im aiming to have it very similiar to RS i know it wont be perfect to runescape but im taking ideas from it.
We currently have Perfect Npc V's Player and also Perfect PVP combat in wilderness.Theyr'e is wilderness levels, training on this server is perfect and its a challenge.All the monsters and citizens are roughly in the same place as Runescape also the drops are similiar just abit better and easier.
Currently have no working skills just yet im working on them as im also going to take my time creating them to perfection.So its basic at the minute
Bringing Classics Back!
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/afhn2s.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/uvkma.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/rrtudf.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2rvzxv7.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/15flsn6.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/29psua8.jpg[/img]
Ok ive now made a start on skills people and its really coming together been working all day and night on this lol hardly had any sleep,well anyways heres my start and nearly finish on skills!
GlobalScape Skills
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/op20jq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/o0xa11.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/219sbd3.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/169jbxk.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/140em1v.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/21j3lg0.jpg[/img][/center]
Thankyou - Regards , Shardyboy

item.title: GlobalScape - World of Entire [Released Beta For you to Work On]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

PKMatch hmmm I wonder who came up with that? Grahams Event manager were are his credits?

[code]#!/bin/bash

Winten’s Linux Compile Script

Tested with: SuSE Linux 10.0

Requires java path be stored in $PATH

Usage:

Enter the following in terminal before first usage:

"chmod +x compile.sh && chmod +x run.sh

javac -classpath . -d bin *.java -g

[/code]

Why in the world would you have Wintens linux compiler here if this was not devolution?

// GLOBALLY NOW last clicked npcID -bakatool

This is in fact devolution, you need to fix your credits to include all the code you ripped off from people, you can’t denied you used it since you didn’t even delete the notes folder.

Read full topic
item.source: GlobalScape - World of Entire [Released Beta For you to Work On]

item.title: GlobalScape - World of Entire [Released Beta For you to Work On]
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

Its nothing like Devolution apart from magic book is on ancients which i chose to do and i’ve told you i have used hybridscape as you see the server ive released today is pretty much blank you have alot to add yourself.Im still coding my original server as im way in front of this now ive completed all skills , and added modern magics spellbook now last but not least just added my first minigame (castlewars) ill be adding screenies soon.

Read full topic
item.source: GlobalScape - World of Entire [Released Beta For you to Work On]
